items.name: Smart View
items.description: Triggers when your phone is casting to a TV or screen.

items.name: Multi control
items.description: Triggers when connected to a Galaxy Book or Tablet via Multi Control.

items.name: Link to Windows
items.description: Triggers when the phone is connected to your PC.

items.name: Wired headphones
items.description: Detects when headphones are plugged in or unplugged.

items.name: Charging status
items.description: Specific triggers for Wired charging, Wireless charging, or Not charging.

items.name: Battery level
items.description: Triggers when battery hits a specific percentage (e.g., "Below 20%" or "Equal to or above 80%").

items.name: Power saving
items.description: Detects if Power Saving mode is currently On or Off.

items.name: Sound mode
items.description: Triggers based on the current mode (Sound, Vibrate, or Mute).

items.name: Dark mode
items.description: Detects if the system Dark Mode is active.

items.name: Watch wearing status
items.description: Detects if you are currently wearing your Galaxy Watch (requires paired watch).

items.name: Game is being played
items.description: Automatically triggers when a game app launches.

items.name: During exercise
items.description: Triggers when a workout is manually started or auto-detected in Samsung Health.

items.name: Media is being played
items.description: Detects when music or video is playing from any app.

items.name: Incoming call
items.description: Triggers when the phone rings (can specify "from anyone" or "specific contacts").

items.name: During call
items.description: Triggers while you are actively on a phone call.

items.name: Amplify ambient sound
items.description: Boosts external volume through headphones (similar to hearing aid functionality).

items.name: Assistant menu
items.description: Toggles the floating on-screen button for quick navigation access.

items.name: Camera flash notification
items.description: Flashes the camera light when you receive alerts.

items.name: Colour correction
items.description: Adjusts colour spectrums for users with colour blindness.

items.name: Colour filter
items.description: Applies a coloured overlay to the screen (e.g., blue light filter).

items.name: Colour inversion
items.description: Inverts all colours on the screen (white becomes black, etc.).

items.name: Extra dim
items.description: Lowers the screen brightness beyond the standard minimum setting.

items.name: Left/right sound balance
items.description: Adjusts volume balance between left and right audio channels.

items.name: Live Caption
items.description: Automatically detects speech in media and displays captions.

items.name: Mono audio
items.description: Combines left and right audio channels into a single mono signal.

items.name: Mute all sounds
items.description: Silences the entire device instantly.

items.name: Screen flash notification
items.description: Flashes the screen display when notifications arrive.

items.name: Auto sync data
items.description: Toggles whether accounts (Google, Samsung, etc.) automatically sync in the background.

items.name: Turn off alarms
items.description: Disables currently active alarms.

items.name: Turn on alarms
items.description: Enables specific alarms.

items.name: Close an app
items.description: Force closes a specific application.

items.name: Open an app pair
items.description: Launches two specific apps simultaneously in split-screen mode.

items.name: Battery protection
items.description: Limits maximum charge (usually to 80% or 85%) to extend battery lifespan.

items.name: Fast charging
items.description: Toggles wired fast charging capabilities.

items.name: Fast wireless charging
items.description: Toggles high-speed wireless charging.

items.name: Ask Bixby
items.description: Triggers the voice assistant to listen for a command.

items.name: Call & text on other devices
items.description: Allows calls/texts to be routed to your Galaxy Tab or Watch.

items.name: Link to Windows
items.description: Connects the phone to a PC via the Phone Link app.

items.name: Multi control
items.description: Allows a Galaxy Book mouse/keyboard to control the phone.

items.name: Quick Share
items.description: Adjusts visibility for file sharing with nearby devices.

items.name: Samsung DeX
items.description: Launches the desktop-like interface on a connected monitor.

items.name: Bluetooth
items.description: Turns Bluetooth on or off.

items.name: Connect to a Bluetooth device
items.description: Connects to a *specific* saved device (e.g., headphones).

items.name: Connect to a VPN
items.description: Initiates a connection to a specific Virtual Private Network.

items.name: Data saver
items.description: Restricts background data usage for apps.

items.name: Disconnect from a Bluetooth device
items.description: Disconnects a specific device.

items.name: Disconnect from a VPN
items.description: Ends the VPN session.

items.name: Flight mode
items.description: Toggles cellular, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth radios off.

items.name: Mobile Hotspot
items.description: Turns your phone into a Wi-Fi router.

items.name: Mobile data
items.description: Toggles 4G/5G cellular data.

items.name: Music Share
items.description: Allows friends to play music on your Bluetooth speaker via your phone.

items.name: NFC
items.description: Toggles Near Field Communication (for payments/tags).

items.name: Network mode
items.description: Switches between network types (e.g., LTE only, 5G preferred).

items.name: Show Wi-Fi QR code
items.description: Displays the QR code for others to join your current network.

items.name: Wi-Fi
items.description: Turns Wi-Fi on or off.

items.name: Optimise phone
items.description: Clears background apps and RAM to boost performance.

items.name: Performance profile
items.description: Switches between Standard (faster) and Light (battery saving) performance profiles.

items.name: Accidental touch protection
items.description: Prevents pocket dials when the screen is dark.

items.name: Adaptive brightness
items.description: Toggles auto-brightness based on ambient light.

items.name: Adaptive colour tone
items.description: Adjusts screen colour temperature based on ambient light (True Tone).

items.name: Brightness
items.description: Sets the screen brightness to a specific fixed percentage.

items.name: Edge panels
items.description: Toggles the slide-out side menu.

items.name: Font size
items.description: Changes text size.

items.name: Font style
items.description: Changes the system font family.

items.name: Motion smoothness
items.description: Toggles refresh rate (e.g., 60Hz vs 120Hz).

items.name: Screen orientation
items.description: Locks or unlocks portrait/landscape rotation.

items.name: Screen resolution
items.description: Changes display sharpness (e.g., FHD+ vs WQHD+).

items.name: Screen timeout
items.description: Sets how long the screen stays on before sleeping.

items.name: Screen zoom
items.description: Adjusts the scaling of UI elements.

items.name: Touch sensitivity
items.description: Increases sensitivity (useful when using screen protectors).

items.name: Beep once
items.description: Plays a single system beep.

items.name: Edge lighting effect once
items.description: Flashes the edge of the screen with a specific colour.

items.name: Vibrate once
items.description: Triggers a short haptic vibration.

items.name: Go to website
items.description: Opens a specific URL in the default browser.

items.name: Navigation button actions
items.description: Modifies what the back/home/recent keys do.

items.name: Open Air command with Pen button
items.description: (S-Pen devices) Toggles S-Pen menu behavior.

items.name: Read text aloud
items.description: Text-to-speech for a specific phrase.

items.name: Record screen
items.description: Starts a screen recording.

items.name: Take screenshot
items.description: Captures the current screen.

items.name: Torch
items.description: Turns the flashlight on or off.

items.name: Video brightness
items.description: Enhances screen brightness specifically when watching video apps.

items.name: Always On Display
items.description: Toggles the watch face staying on.

items.name: Brightness
items.description: Sets watch screen brightness.

items.name: Disconnection alerts
items.description: Vibrates when the watch loses phone connection.

items.name: Power saving
items.description: Toggles watch battery saver mode.

items.name: Raise wrist to wake
items.description: Toggles waking the watch screen via gesture.

items.name: Sound mode
items.description: Switches watch between Sound, Vibrate, or Mute.

items.name: Touch screen to wake
items.description: Toggles waking watch by tapping.

items.name: Turn bezel to wake
items.description: Toggles waking watch by rotating the bezel.

items.name: Show images
items.description: Opens a specific picture or album.

items.name: Block Bixby during games
items.description: Prevents voice assistant interruptions.

items.name: Block auto brightness during games
items.description: Locks brightness while gaming.

items.name: Block edge panel during games
items.description: Disables the side swipe menu while gaming.

items.name: Location
items.description: Toggles GPS services on or off.

items.name: Always On Display
items.description: Toggles the phone's standby info screen.

items.name: Keep your phone unlocked
items.description: Extends Smart Lock duration.

items.name: Unlock with biometrics
items.description: Automatically attempts to unlock using face/fingerprint.

items.name: Spotify playlists
items.description: Starts playing a specific Spotify playlist.

items.name: Show custom notification
items.description: Displays a text notification you write yourself (useful for reminders).

items.name: Answer using speaker
items.description: Automatically answers incoming calls on speakerphone.

items.name: Decline call and send a quick message
items.description: Rejects call and texts the caller.

items.name: High contrast keyboard
items.description: Changes keyboard colours for visibility.

items.name: Languages and types
items.description: Switches input languages.

items.name: Mode
items.description: Changes keyboard layout (standard, split, floating).

items.name: Samsung Keyboard voice input
items.description: Toggles voice-to-text.

items.name: Turn on Secure Wi-Fi
items.description: Enables Samsung's privacy protection for public networks.

items.name: AI assistant volume
items.description: Sets volume for Bixby/Google.

items.name: Boost dialogue
items.description: Enhances vocal clarity in audio.

items.name: Call volume
items.description: Sets volume for phone calls.

items.name: Dialing keypad tone
items.description: Toggles the sound made when typing numbers.

items.name: Dolby Atmos
items.description: Toggles surround sound processing.

items.name: Equaliser
items.description: Applies a specific audio EQ preset (e.g., Rock, Pop).

items.name: Loudness normalisation
items.description: Keeps volume consistent across tracks.

items.name: Ringtone
items.description: Changes the incoming call ringtone.

items.name: Samsung Keyboard sound
items.description: Toggles typing sounds.

items.name: Samsung Keyboard vibration
items.description: Toggles typing haptics.

items.name: Separate app sound
items.description: Routes specific app audio to a different device (e.g., Spotify to speaker, Nav to phone).

items.name: Vibrate while ringing
items.description: Toggles vibration during calls.

items.name: Start a timer
items.description: Begins a countdown for a set duration.

items.name: Dim wallpaper when Dark mode is on
items.description: Darkens the background image to match the system theme.
